# Organic Solar Cells Achieve 20.02% Efficiency with New Giant Acceptors

**Category:** technology
**Generated (UTC):** 2025-12-15T05:54:36+00:00
**Published:** December 12, 2025
**Publisher:** TechXplore

## Summary
Researchers developed novel giant acceptors using an oxygenated linker for nonhalogenated-processed organic solar cells. This breakthrough enables a power conversion efficiency of 20.02%, advancing sustainable energy technologies.
